thread.title: Ann Summers recalls Black Power Wand vibrator
thread.title_full: Ann Summers recalls Black Power Wand vibrator

title: Ann Summers recalls Black Power Wand vibrator
text: comments Sex shop Ann Summers is recalling a popular vibrator over fears prolonged use will expose its wires - and cause an electric shock Sex shop Ann Summers is recalling a popular vibrator over fears prolonged use will expose its wires - and cause an intimate electric shock. The store is displaying notices in shop windows, advising customers with a Black Power Wand to visit in store or contact a member of customer services for help. They warn that although the recall is a precautionary damage, the vibrators have become damaged in a small number of cases. Black Power Wands are no longer available to buy online at Ann Summers. The notice reads: 'The quality and safety of our products are of paramount importance to us. 'Therefore, as a precautionary measure we are recalling the above product. 'The product complies with all relevant CE safety testing standards. RELATED ARTICLES
